attributes.action: Commission a seal cull around the British Isles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A seal cull is a must for inshore fisherman, the british coast has around 40% of the worlds gray seal population. Damage caused by seals to static nets, and fish taken by the seals is making it impossible for fisherman to scratch a living. Many are being put out of business.
